tool.name: SAGA.grid_calculus.6
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTARGET_TEMPLATE False output_data_TARGET_OUT_GRID $output_data_TARGET_OUT_GRID name SAGA.grid_calculus.6 RADIUS $RADIUS ITERATIONS $ITERATIONS TARGET_DEFINITION $TARGET_DEFINITION TARGET_USER_SIZE $TARGET_USER_SIZE TARGET_USER_XMIN $TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX $TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN $TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX $TARGET_USER_YMAX TARGET_USER_COLS $TARGET_USER_COLS TARGET_USER_ROWS $TARGET_USER_ROWS TARGET_USER_FITS $TARGET_USER_FITS TARGET_TEMPLATE $TARGET_TEMPLATE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TARGET_OUT_GRID $OutputSection_TARGET_OUT_GRID.outputType_TARGET_OUT_GRID transmissionMode_TARGET_OUT_GRID $OutputSection_TARGET_OUT_GRID.transmissionMode_TARGET_OUT_GRID

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TARGET_OUT_GRID
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: (c) 2004 by Victor Olaya. Random Terrain Generation
